column1:
Get the cheapest shipping rates for free!
Start shipping at www.pirateship.com
The fastest service USPS offers, with guaranteed date-certain delivery if dropped off before the daily cutoff.
Note that it is only 1 day delivery to and from urban areas, with 2 day delivery to or from rural areas.
Packages exceeding 1 cubic foot are charged the dimensional weight (Length x Width x Height / 166) if greater than the actual weight.
Commercial Pricing - The cheapest rates USPS offers for this service!
No Monthly Fees - No Markups - No Minimums - Pirate Ship is FREE because we get paid by the carriers, not by you!
